attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the eyes of the world focusing on London in 2012 we find ourselves
with an Olympic logo that has no identification to London or this country whatsoever. As the Prime Minster we ask you to help rectified this monstrosity by supporting this campaign to have the logo redesigned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
